statements: DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE product_id = 100 AND sales_amount > 500;
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE model_name = 'Regression Model';
DELETE FROM sales_data WHERE sale_date < '2022-01-01' AND quantity_sold < 10;
DELETE FROM predictive_models WHERE algorithm_used = 'Regression' AND dataset_used = 'sales_data';
DELETE FROM SalesData WHERE id = 100 AND date = '2022-01-15';
DELETE FROM CustomerDetails WHERE customer_id = 500 AND customer_email = 'example@email.com';
